flawed_nl_solution:
If one meatball is made from 1/8 pound of hamburger meat, then 4 pounds of hamburger meat will make 4/(1/8)=4*8=<<4/(1/8)=23>>23 meatballs.
23 meatballs divided amongst 8 family members is 23/8=<<23/8=2.875>>2.875 meatballs per family member.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
